titlestmt.titleproper: Social Science Research Council records, Administration and Officers Files
A Guide to the Social Science Research Council records, Administration and Officers Files FA1840

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2024-03-13 18:27:11 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: Social Science Research Council records, Administration and Officers Files

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The Administration and Officers Files is a small collection primarily consisting of select program and policy files and administrative records from the office of the President, executive officers and program officers. The collection contains correspondence regarding SSRC committees, reports on grants awarded to the SSRC, research papers and publications, and fellowship datasheets.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The Social Science Research Council archives are primarily arranged into three record groups distinguished by the date of their donation to the Archive Center. Accession 1 (Record Group 1) consists of the documents received by the Archive Center in 1990; Accession 2 (Record Group 2) was transferred to the Archive Center in 1994; Record Group 3 was transferred to the Archive Center in 2017-2018.
This collection of Administration and Officers Files were also transferred to RAC as part of the tranche of records received in 2017-2018.
